trans-unit.source: Maintains the registration of all access keys and the handling of interop keyboard commands between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 會維護所有便捷鍵的註冊和處理之間的 interop 鍵盤命令的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: An AccessKeyManager object is created on demand with one per <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 依<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>每一個要求建立 AccessKeyManager 物件

trans-unit.source: The AccessKeyManager is attached as an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> and exposes methods to <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A> access keys.
trans-unit.target: 做為事件處理常式附加 AccessKeyManager<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>和公開方法，以<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A>存取金鑰。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: When the registered access key is pressed, the AccessKeyManager calls the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> method on the target element.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的便捷鍵按下時，AccessKeyManager 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A>目標項目上的方法。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以與任意數目的存取金鑰相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>路由的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 加入的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>附加事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>接聽此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified key is registered as an access keys in the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否指定索引鍵是否註冊為指定的範圍內的便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: The presentation source to query for `key`.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的呈現來源`key`。

trans-unit.source: The key to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is registered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果登錄機碼;，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified access keys as if a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event for the key was passed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 處理指定的存取金鑰如同<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>事件索引鍵已傳遞給<xref href="System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The scope for the access key.
trans-unit.target: 存取索引鍵範圍。

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if `key` has multiple matches.
trans-unit.target: 指出如果`key`具有多個相符項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more keys that match; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果有多個相符的索引鍵否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Associates the specified access keys with the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的存取金鑰與指定的項目產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When the access keys is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> method of `element` is called.
trans-unit.target: 按下便捷鍵時，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A>方法`element`稱為。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以與任意數目的存取金鑰相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: The element to associate `key` with.
trans-unit.target: 要建立關聯的項目`key`與。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event handler from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>事件處理常式，從指定的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>接聽此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Disassociates the specified access keys from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的項目指定的存取金鑰會解除關聯。

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to disassociate `key`.
trans-unit.target: 要從中解除關聯的項目`key`。
